resources.string:
" 1. Switch Instrument: Press this button to change to different instruments.
" "2. Help button: Return to this screen.
" "3. Go to Instrument: Go to the instrument screen, will play sounds based on selected instrument.
" "4. Selected Instrument: Displays what instrument is currently selected.
" "5. Change Color: Change the color scheme of the app!
"

" 1. Menu Button: Return to main menu.
" "2. Octave Selector: Slide left for lower pitch notes, right for higher ones.
" "3. Record Button: Press the button to start recording, it will turn red. Press again to stop.
" " NOTE:Recording automatically saves when recording stops, and overwrites
" " the previous recording!
" "4. Restart Button: Restart the playback of the recording.
" "5. Play/Pause Button: Play the selected recording. Press again to stop playback.
" "6. Help Button: Use this button to return to this screen.
" "7. Keyboard Keys: Press the keys to make sounds."
